document_data.mainbody:
Darrake Harnwood was a War Wizard of Cormyr until the late 15 century DR.
For whatever reason, Harnwood was known by name to Marlin Stormserpent.
When in Mirtul of the , Marlin Stormserpent gathered a group to covertly appropriate the Wyverntongue Chalice from Castle Obarskyr in Suzail, a group of his hirelings arrived late after having had to slay a War Wizard who was following them. Stormserpent asked if it was Darrake Harnwood, and the killer agreed. They also said that hed been disposed of at some jakes.
